subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[艷]], [[豓]]}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant forms}} of 豔)''
* {{l|mul|[[艶]]}} ''(Japanese {{w|shinjitai}})'' and {{l|mul|[[艳]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese}})''

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally {{zh-l|*豓}}. {{Han compound|豐|盇|c1=s|c2=p|t1=abundant, great|ls=psc}} (corrupted to {{zh-l|*盍}}).
